mapper.sql: id, country, client_identity, user_id, platform_terminal,platform_code,platform_id,platform_Name, website_domain, url_path, create_time
mapper.select: SELECT platform_id AS platformId, platform_terminal AS sourceType, user_id AS userId FROM data_game_start WHERE create_time <= #{endTime} AND create_time > #{startTime} GROUP BY platform_id,platform_terminal,user_id
mapper.insert:
insert into data_game_start
id,
country,
client_identity,
user_id,
platform_terminal,
platform_id,
platform_name,
website_domain,
url_path,
create_time,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{country,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{clientIdentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{platformTerminal,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{platformId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{platformName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{websiteDomain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{urlPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update data_game_start
country = #{country,jdbcType=INTEGER},
client_identity = #{clientIdentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
platform_terminal = #{platformTerminal,jdbcType=INTEGER},
platform_Name = #{platformId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
platform_id = #{platformId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
website_domain = #{websiteDomain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url_path = #{urlPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update data_game_start set country = #{country,jdbcType=INTEGER}, client_identity = #{clientIdentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, platform_terminal = #{platformTerminal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, platform_id = #{platformId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, platform_name = #{platformName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, website_domain = #{websiteDomain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url_path = #{urlPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) AS gameStartCount, platform_terminal AS sourceType, platform_code AS platformCode, platform_name AS platformName FROM data_game_start WHERE create_time >= DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S'), interval #{intervalTime} minute) AND create_time <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') GROUP BY platform_terminal,platform_code,platform_name

select user_id as userId,platform_terminal as osType from data_platform_start where country = 0
and create_time>= date_sub(DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S'), interval #{intervalTime} minute)
and create_time <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and user_id is not null and user_id != '' group by platform_terminal,user_id
